title: ASD
message:
Hey all.
Am I able to ask ASD software questions here?

title: ASD
message: Likly a amateur question. I have them all on iso on my pc but need to make them run on usb for the mac how do I do that ?

title: ASD
message:
Any reason to quote an entire post visible few centimeters above?
Please, maintain forum aesthetic.

You can try to write the dmg on the pendrive using TransMac under Windows.
But I recommend you to get an working Mac, to avoid any headache.

I personally have a 32GB stick with 15 EFI ASD versions...

title: ASD
message:
Thank you 
I have a working macbook, would I just copy the iso via  trans mac or a diffent program. Also I assume you would make multiple partitions, and choose which to boot from on the usb?

title: ASD
message:
TransMac is intented to use under Windows.

Many videos available how to do it on MacBook.
Each ASD dmg has some pdf howto files; mount the image first.
